name: jsFiddle Dark (patched)
description:
A fork/update to jsFiddle: Dark to fix the top nav menu.
Shrunk and fixed the coloration of the top bar, left the css de-min'd.
additional_info:
Many beers to user 254976 for the heavy lifting on this one. Vast majority of the css is unchanged from his:
style 97505

There might be more cleaning possible; I didn't do much more than make the style functional again. If you wanna make sure there's no superfluous rules, do it yourself, and then feel free to let me know in a comment on this and I'll nix it. I actually check back here on occasion.

The de-minning used tabs so you can be a heathen with something other than 4-space width if you want.


UPDATED: 2015/12/4
Noticed the progressbar was in the way of mouse-nav on HTML/CSS, so I nixed it as well.
